sentences.en: Beith threw himself enthusiastically into the task, but it was virtually impossible.
sentences.cn: 比思起劲地投入这项工作, 但实际上这是不可能办到的.

sentences.en: Conveniently overlooking the fact that she wouldn't be able to meet the commitment, she agreed enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 她不理会自己不能遵守承诺的事实, 热心地答应了.

sentences.en: Critics enthusiastically acclaimed the new play.
sentences.cn: 评论家们热情洋溢地称赞这部新剧.

sentences.en: He pumped Collins'hand enthusiastically and immediately let hi to his companions.
sentences.cn: 他热情地拉着柯林斯的手,马上把他介绍给自己的朋友.

sentences.en: Her friends repeated the pleasing phrase enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 她的朋友们都热情地赞不绝口.

sentences.en: I wrote enthusiastically to several of my classmates on this subject.
sentences.cn: 我热情地写信给几个同班同学,讨论这个问题.

sentences.en: It is unlikely that this suggestion will be greeted enthusiastically in the Baltic States.
sentences.cn: 该提议不大可能在波罗的海诸国得到热烈响应。

sentences.en: She replied enthusiastically, no, they didn't like it.
sentences.cn: 她很热心地回答说, 可不是, 她们是不喜欢这个的.

sentences.en: She worked indefatigably and enthusiastically to interest the young in music.
sentences.cn: 为了激发年轻人对音乐的兴趣，她一直孜孜不倦、积极热情地工作。

sentences.en: Some teachers enthusiastically espouse the benefits to be gained from educational software.
sentences.cn: 有些教师热烈赞同可以从教学软件中得到好处的观点.
公告受到人们的热烈欢迎。

sentences.en: The others barely glanced at it and went back to their shovels, almost enthusiastically, searching for the French Woman, but I went up to the body and forced myself to look at it closely.
sentences.cn: 其他的人几乎连看都没看上一眼，就拿起他们的锹，差不多都很热心地去寻找那个法国女人的尸体，但我凑到那具尸体前，迫使我自己仔细地看看。

sentences.en: The plump ginger kitten had settled comfortably in her arms and was purring enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 胖乎乎的姜黄色小猫惬意地躺在她的怀里，大声地打着呼噜。

sentences.en: The press began to lionize him enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 媒体开始狂热地吹捧他。
他们却热诚地同意这行动.

words.tran_cn: 热心（过去式enthused，过去分词enthused，现在分词enthusing，第三人称单数enthuses）
